load_section.description: Loads the specified section from the master kernel using the module's reference binding.

resolve_path.description: Resolves dot-notation paths (e.g., dimensions.survival_orientation) within the master kernel.

validate_reference.description: Ensures the module reference points to the canonical kernel and has not been altered.

routing_rules.notes: All dimension modules must read from the canonical dimensions map in the master kernel.
Interaction modules load the global interaction matrix.
Override modules must reference the stress overrides from the kernel.
Output modules map directly to kernel output logic and report structures.

notes: The access_priority array defines the order engines must follow when resolving contradictions or determining dominant psychological signals.
